explains: adj. 苦恼的；痛苦难忍的
vt. 使极度痛苦；折磨（agonize 的 ing 形式）
vi. 感到极度痛苦（agonize 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: It was the most agonizing decision of her life.
sentences.cn: 这是她一生中最痛苦的决定。

sentences.en: This is a torturous, agonizing way to kill someone.
sentences.cn: 这是个折磨人、让人痛苦难当的杀人方法。

sentences.en: Perhaps he was agonizing over the moral issues involved.
sentences.cn: 或许他正在为牵涉到的道德问题伤脑筋。
